poster.username: Forgive me for I have sinned

body: I want to see that future bro, this is agonizing
Finally some kind of story after sifting through all the vanilla

"If YOU ARE REaDIng ThIs cOmmeNT YOuR parEnts WIlL diE wiTHIN 5 YeArs. tO unDo this CuRsE You NEeD TO copy THis AND PASte it oN 5 otHER MaNGa. I'M So, So sOrRY,PLEAse ForgIVe ME"

No one cares, fuck off.
I feel like a perv for enjoying and encouraging this.... I hope this becomes a series
